title: Craig Newmark explains why he’s pulling back on funding journalism
description: Craig Newmark, the early web pioneer best known for starting Craigslist, has poured hundreds of millions of dollars into journalism. But in an interview last week with Ben Gose at The Chronicle of Philanthropy, Newmark said he is pulling back from news. “A lot of my efforts haven’t been as effective as I’d like them...
